TopicTitle: "Eve: Order Zero" -- a KSP Graphic Novel (POSTLUDE COMPLETE...bet you didn't see THAT coming.)

Articles.Content:
Oh, the agony of surface docking maneuvers.

Yarely done is right! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Happy landings!

I sense an interlude coming soon... Maybe a Dres or Jool mission?

Or more fanfic!

> 
> I sense an interlude coming soon... Maybe a Dres or Jool mission?
> Or more fanfic!

It's a few hundred days until the Hohmann transfer home, but I anticipate Kranefly having a LOT of dV to spare (it's already been to Gilly and back for a top-off), so I may leave sooner than that. In any case I will probably not have any Interlude until everyone is (hopefully) on the way out of Eve SOI.

As to the next mission, I have always intended to wait for 1.1, add life support (if it's not stock in 1.1) and go to Jool. Could indeed make a stop at Dres on the way. Will consider doing something sooner depending on what's in 1.0.5, but I have to say this is becoming a but exhausting...

If I do an Interlude in this book, it will be a teaser for the next. Am already thinking up something...surprising ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> It's a few hundred days until the Hohmann transfer home, but I anticipate Kranefly having a LOT of dV to spare (it's already been to Gilly and back for a top-off), so I may leave sooner than that. In any case I will probably not have any Interlude until everyone is (hopefully) on the way out of Eve SOI.
> As to the next mission, I have always intended to wait for 1.1, add life support (if it's not stock in 1.1) and go to Jool. Could indeed make a stop at Dres on the way. Will consider doing something sooner depending on what's in 1.0.5, but I have to say this is becoming a but exhausting...
> 
> If I do an Interlude in this book, it will be a teaser for the next. Am already thinking up something...surprising ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I think if you add a life-support mod, it should be USI-LS, it seems the most stock-alike of life support mods. Just my $0.02, though.

> 
> I think if you add a life-support mod, it should be USI-LS, it seems the most stock-alike of life support mods. Just my $0.02, though.

Canadian or American dollar?

Anyways, pick whatever LS seems best fit for you. Usually, whenver I use LS, I go for Snacks!, 'cause it seems, more, Kerbal...![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

> 
> Canadian or American dollar?
> Anyways, pick whatever LS seems best fit for you. Usually, whenver I use LS, I go for Snacks!, 'cause it seems, more, Kerbal...![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

International opinion cents (IOC).

> 
> It's a few hundred days until the Hohmann transfer home, but I anticipate Kranefly having a LOT of dV to spare (it's already been to Gilly and back for a top-off), so I may leave sooner than that. In any case I will probably not have any Interlude until everyone is (hopefully) on the way out of Eve SOI.
> As to the next mission, I have always intended to wait for 1.1, add life support (if it's not stock in 1.1) and go to Jool. Could indeed make a stop at Dres on the way. Will consider doing something sooner depending on what's in 1.0.5, but I have to say this is becoming a but exhausting...

> If I do an Interlude in this book, it will be a teaser for the next. Am already thinking up something...surprising ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Poor Dres.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-20T00:42:03Z" title="10/20/2015 12:42  AM" data-short="8 yr">October 20, 2015</time> by Sanic**

> 
> Poor Dres.

It is a sad and lonely space potato.

Anybody here interested in a Dres awareness group? 

IDEA! What if Kenlie wrote a fanfic about Dres that made it the most awesome planet in the Kerbol system?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-20T01:37:13Z" title="10/20/2015 01:37  AM" data-short="8 yr">October 20, 2015</time> by Sanic**

Dres is actually the head of its own chapter of the awareness group Space Potatoes United (aka SPU-D)

Why else would all the asteroids hang out with Dres?

> 
> Anybody here interested in a Dres awareness group? 
> IDEA! What if Kenlie wrote a fanfic about Dres that made it the most awesome planet in the Kerbol system?

A Dres awareness group sounds great! What would it do to raise Dres awareness, though?

I dunno, maybe epic Dres missions?

Kuzzter once started a "Save the ROUND-8" thread that helped save it from becoming a xenon tank.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-20T01:56:19Z" title="10/20/2015 01:56  AM" data-short="8 yr">October 20, 2015</time> by Sanic**

Hah!

Mort may have just lost most of the wind in his sails.

Random text to initiate small talk!

Seriously, has anybody noticed the decline in activity on this thread?

> 
> Random text to initiate small talk!
> Seriously, has anybody noticed the decline in activity on this thread?

No, not really.

I think people tend to post when something really big in the story happens (Kuzzter, I am *not* saying the story is boring right now. I'm just saying that people tend to post when something like the Guess the distance challenge appears).

Happy landings!

^^yes, please, *relax*. As much as I enjoy the high reply count and views, this is not a chat thread and doesn't need to get bumped. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) New pages will come out as they come out, and comments will appear when and if people have something to say about them.

Bill and his persistence magic ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) And of course poses and faces during the docking were all top-notch. All the props are belong to Kuzzter ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Kerbfleet! The original KSP webcomic series! Often imitated--*and frequently surpassed!* Three more pages ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I sense something ominous. It almost feels like Val is a double agent.

EDIT: I got here before the thread title changed. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-20T19:57:23Z" title="10/20/2015 07:57  PM" data-short="8 yr">October 20, 2015</time> by Starwhip**

Is that supposed to be some wierd foreboding by Val? It certainly feels like some kind of foreboding.

Also, poor Gregmore, lol.....

> 
> I sense something ominous. It almost feels like Val is a double agent.
> EDIT: I got here before the thread title changed. ![k_cheesy.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_cheesy.gif)

Well, we already know that Bill and Val discussed and planned something before the whole rescue mission adventure started, so, it's probably something that Gregmore might end up interfering with, whether intentionally or not.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-20T20:06:09Z" title="10/20/2015 08:06  PM" data-short="8 yr">October 20, 2015</time> by smjjames**

> 
> I sense something ominous. It almost feels like Val is a double agent.
> EDIT: I got here before the thread title changed. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

If this were Plan Kappa, she'd probably be the clone of an evil twin from a parallel reality, or something like that. But since it's Eve: Order Zero, it can only mean one thing: character development!

Hey, Val! Leave some for poor Gregmore!
Poor Gregmore. I guess he'll always be part of the B-team.
perhaps we're in for some courtroom drama next?

Val is just trying to protect Gregmore from the biiig trouble that Mort was talking about.

Very nice update, Kuzzter. I'd love to see what Gregmore's 'personality quirks' are. Great line - "Maybe if I tried speaking with an accent?". ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Happy landings!
This sounds like some kind of Jeb-level maneuver. Backup plan in case the ascent vehicle gets slightly short on Delta v?
